mapper.sql: id, asCode, asName, currencyField, asType, COMMENTS, STATE, IS_DELETEMARK, MODIFY_TIME, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_ID
mapper.select:
SELECT p.id, p.asCode, p.asName, p.COMMENTS, p.STATE, p.IS_DELETEMARK, p.MODIFY_TIME, p.CREATE_TIME, p.CREATE_USER_ID, p.MODIFY_USER_ID, GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(d.deptId,'-',d.deptName)) currencyField FROM yb_appeal_sumdept p left join yb_appeal_sumdept_data d on p.id = d.pid where p.IS_DELETEMARK = 1
and ( p.asName like concat('%', #{ currencyField } ,'%') or p.id in(select DISTINCT pid from yb_appeal_sumdept_data where deptName like concat('%', #{ currencyField } ,'%')) )
GROUP BY p.id order by p.create_time desc
